ygData.msgSnippet: Spit landed on Megatons foot, he wiped it off carefully trying not to touch it. Thank you for stateing the obvious dear, Mutants are better than the previous

Spit landed on Megatons foot, he wiped it off carefully trying not to touch
it.

"Thank you for stateing the obvious dear, Mutants are better than the
previous bots, and I am a Mutant so that puts me at the top of the food
chain." He started walking away and stopped suddenly, turning and pointing
to Ice and Lunarpine, "So Veratis told you your abilities were an accident
did he?" He stepped away again as if to leave "Are you really that
gullible?"
-----------------------------------------------------------------
Depth Charge walked up to Megaton and punched him."leave now or die."

Megaton fealt the sudden impact of Depth Charges fist and heard the feeble
threat from the opponent, He transformed to his dragon mode looking down
toward all the little toys he had to play with. He raised his foot stomping
on the ground shaking the world around. "You have some nerve making idle
threats to a bot who's shown you no ill will, I'm beginning to wonder who
the aggressors are in this war Maximals or Predacons.




----- Original Message -----
From: <logomorph@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Friday, March 23, 2001 12:03 PM
Subject: Re: Ice/ New battle


> Ice::
>
> She sneered at MegaTon. "Veratis nothing.  This wasn't a gift or
> talent. Mine was unplanned." she said breathing heavy. "And I'll get
> you yet you walking pile of scrap metal. Mutants are not average
> bots. And it takes a lot more to keep us down." She spit at MegaTon.
> She looked at her shoulder and saw her white fur all stained red.
> She groaned and stood up on all four paws. "Now, you want to finish
> this? Or leave peacefully?"
>
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > Megatons negotiations seemed to be going well when suddenly energy
> bars
> > appeared. "What is this some Maximal trick?" he looked around, the
> Maximals
> > were still at alert status and didn't react when the cage appeared.
> >
> > Lunarpine was trying to console Ice but when he tried to put his
> arms around
> > her the cage appeared and a sudden shock was sent through him when
> he
> > thought he made contact with the bars. "Ahhhh." he yelped, startled
> at the
> > pain.
> >
> > The yelp caught Megatons attention. "I stand corrected, this is not
> a
> > Maximal trick, this is a Mutant trick." He watched as Ice collapsed
> to the
> > ground. "And it would appear that Veratis gave us all some unique
> skills."
> > The large bot smiled toward Ice sensing her dissapointment. .
>
>
